sentences.en: Furthermore, the aggressor wrote contumelious words aft .
sentences.cn: 更有甚者， 侵略者在船尾写了侮辱性的话。

sentences.en: I have read a sentence in an essay:Even Yangjia are put to death, please don't use any contumelious words on him.
sentences.cn: 即使杨佳被判死刑，也不许用侮辱性的字眼。

sentences.en: It was found that structural models of a swearing discourse possess 3 parts: the swearing appellation, the contumelious special swearing expression, and the auxiliary statement of swearing cause.
sentences.cn: 本文发现：詈骂言语行为的话语结构模式主要包括三部分，即詈骂性称呼语、侮辱性专门詈骂语和辅助性詈骂原因陈述；

trans.tran_cn: 指责的，侮辱的，傲慢无礼的
